text: What data formats can IntegrationHub parse?
Task table is a "___" table. Fill in the blank with the right option.
What is the purpose of a formatter in ServiceNow instance? Select one of the following.
options: Formatter allows you to populate fields automatically
Formatter is a form element used to display information that is not a field in the record
A formatter allows you to configure applications on your instance
Formatter is a set of conditions applied to a table to help find and work with data
correctAnswers: Formatter is a form element used to display information that is not a field in the record

text: On the ServiceNow instance, where does the global text search appear?
Which of the below is not a list interface element?
Which of the following is a best example of Contextual Security in ServiceNow?
Which protocol is used to send outbound emails from ServiceNow?
A variable Set is a modular unit of variables that "CAN BE" shared between catalog items. True or False?
Which one of the statements below describes the relationship between the incident table and task table?
options: The incident table is the parent of the task
The incident table extends the task table
The task table extends the incident table
The task table is the child of the incident table
correctAnswers: The incident table extends the task table

text: Which module in the service catalog application is responsible for creating items?
Which of the following represent "One-to-Many" relationship fields?
options: Relationship used to build SLA conditions
Reference Fields, Glide List, and Document ID Fields
Add users to groups that have been assigned the desired role
SLA Definition, Task SLA, SLA Workflow, SLA Automation
correctAnswers: Reference Fields, Glide List, and Document ID Fields

text: Which technique is used to get information from a series of referenced fields from different tables?
Which of the below components runs on server side on ServiceNow instance? Select all that apply.
Which OOB support will help you to avoid creating duplicates while importing data?
Which table stores information about CI relationship existing on a ServiceNow instance?
From the below options, please choose the correct definition of "inactivity monitor" in ServiceNow instance.
options: It is used to enhance the system logs. It provides more information on the duration of transactions between the client and the server.
It triggers an event for a task record if the task is inactive for a certain period of time. If the task remains inactive, the monitor repeats at regular intervals.
correctAnswers: It triggers an event for a task record if the task is inactive for a certain period of time. If the task remains inactive, the monitor repeats at regular intervals.

text: Can we coalesce multiple fields in a table for given transform map?
options: No. Only 1 field per table can be coalesced

text: Does ServiceNow support table rotation?
Which of the following statements holds true for Service Catalog categories?
options: Users with the admin or catalog_admin roles can view categories only if there is an active item in the category and Availability is set to either Desktop or Both.
Users with the admin or cat_admin roles can view categories only if there is an active item in the category and Availability is set to either Desktop or Both.
correctAnswers: Users with the admin or catalog_admin roles can view categories only if there is an active item in the category and Availability is set to either Desktop or Both.

text: What purpose does Client Transaction Time plugin serve in ServiceNow?
options: It enables to log a message in ServiceNow.
It enhances the system logs by providing additional information about the durations of transactions
correctAnswers: It enhances the system logs by providing additional information about the durations of transactions

text: Which of the following statements is true about ServiceNow LDAP?
options: ServiceNow LDAP has only read access to customers AD
ServiceNow LDAP has read and write access to customers AD
correctAnswers: ServiceNow LDAP has only read access to customers AD

text: Which is the parent table for incident, problem, change in an ServiceNow instance?

What is the master table that contains a record for each table in the database?
How are users related to roles or groups in an ServiceNow instance?
Where are customizations done on ServiceNow instance stored?
"___" is used to join two tables. Fill in the blank with the correct option.
Is it true that a variable set can be used in multiple catalog items?
What defines conditions that are evaluated against users to determine which users can access Service Catalog items?
Use "___" to create reports by modifying an existing report, or create a new report from scratch. Choose the right option from below.
What is the sequence of conditions in a ServiceNow SLA definition?
Which one of the following statements is correct when referring to UI Actions?
options: UI Actions on the Task Table are not available to its extended tables.
UI Actions are only executed on the server.
Conditions can be specified to determine when a UI Action appears
UI Actions cannot use scripts or be scripted.
correctAnswers: Conditions can be specified to determine when a UI Action appears
